title: Walmart To Offer Checking Accounts
teaser: Walmart is teaming up with Green Dot Bank to offer low price checking accounts starting this October. What are the implications for the banking industry?
contentencoded:
The country’s largest retailer is getting into banking.

Walmart is teaming up with Green Dot Bank, known for pre-paid credit and debit cards, to offer low price checking accounts starting this October.

Walmart will effectively act as bank branches for GoBank, the mobile banking platform backed by Green Dot Bank. Will Walmart succeed and what would that mean for the nation’s banking system?

CNN’s Maggie Lake joins Here & Now‘s Robin Young to discuss Walmart’s new business venture.

Guest

  • Maggie Lake, business reporter for CNN. She tweets @maggielake
